original_text: Then Joab went to see the king in his room. He said to the king, ‘Today you have made your men feel ashamed. But the army has saved your life today. We have saved the lives of your sons, your daughters, your wives, and your slave wives.
korean_text: 요압이 집에 들어가서 왕께 말씀 드리되 왕께서 오늘 왕의 생명과 왕의 자녀의 생명과 처첩과 비빈들의 생명을 구원한 모든 부하들의 얼굴을 부끄럽게 하시니

sentences.original_text: Then Joab went to see the king
'Today you have made your men feel ashamed.
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘 당신은 당신의 부하들을 부끄럽게 만들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: But the army has saved your life today.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 군대가 오늘 당신의 목숨을 구했습니다.

sentences.original_text: We have saved the lives of your sons
